ProjectTitle: Towards treatments of Congenital Disorders of Glycosylation
InitialFeedbackHistory: 16/05/2022 4, 7: [REDACTED] you considering to submit data to MetaboLights it may be easier to already have a look at their metadata guidelines and use these rather than an adjusted [REDACTED] core. [REDACTED] genomics you can take a look here: www.ebi.ac.uk/submission to see if there are suitable repositories for your data and which metadata they need. 6. Please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy expects data to be preserved for 10 years and the CTC/UZL ethics committee may even request 25 years of preservation if your data is part of a clinical trial.
